CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( ae__c )),"Arrive Early: " & ae__r.City__c ,"") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( sb__c ))," | Stay Behind: " & sb__r.City__c ,"") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( pre_tour_stopover__c ))," | Pre Stop Over: " & pre_tour_stopover__r.Destination__c ,"") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( post_tour_stopover__c ))," | Post Stop Over: " & post_tour_stopover__r.Destination__c ,"") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK( land_activity__c ))," | Land Actvity: " & land_activity__r.title__c ,"")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK( land_activity_a__c ))," | Land Actvity: " & land_activity_a__r.title__c ,"")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK( land_activity_b__c ))," | Land Actvity: " & land_activity_b__r.title__c ,"")& IF(NOT(ISBLANK( land_activity_c__c ))," | Land Actvity: " & land_activity_c__r.title__c ,"")
CustomField.label: Extras Summary
